description:
🙏 Remembering 9/11...do you remember where you were when you saw the 1st images of the planes crashing into the World Trade Center
Buildings?

I sure do....

My wife, @rhondaswan was about to leave the bedroom of our Condo in #SanDiego to the airport for a Corporate work meeting....

..when I told her that she's not go anywhere.

I just got back home late from the night before from the last flight ✈️ into San Diego from a 5 day business convention.

9/11 Attacks were 19 years ago today....

And is etched into every Americans minds as well as most of the entire
World 🌎 for that matter.

What did it mean to me....

...that you never know when Today just may be your Last!

For me...the 9/11 Attack along with my Father passing away from #AIDS when I was 16....Left me with this:

You have to Go Live Now....Today!

Here are 3 Questions to Think about...

1)  Are you spending ""Quality Time"" with the People ❤️ you Love? 

2)  Do you Love what you are Doing?

3)  If you knew that you only had 6, 12, 24, 36 or 60 months to LIVE....
what would you be doing Today?

Go out and Live Today...Even if “THEY” 🧐 tell you not to.

Photo 📸 by Mirza Nurman

#BeUnstoppable #september11  #911 #911memorial #livetoday #plandemic2020 #remembering911 #911tribute
